New Records: Angel Di Maria scored his 31st goal for Argentina, tying him with Gonzalo Higuain for the fifth-most goals in the country's history
Key Match Events: Angel Di Maria scored in the 40th minute to give Argentina a 1-0 lead
Pre-Game Insights: Argentina head coach Lionel Scaloni said that sometimes it's not worth risking Lionel Messi's health, especially with a big tournament coming up
Post-Match Reflections: Scaloni said that the goal is to continue competing and that these guys have competing in their blood
Miscellaneous Highlights: Argentina hasn't lost to Ecuador in their last seven meetings, a streak dating back to 2019
Others: Lionel Messi returned to the international stage for the first time in six months, replacing Angel Di Maria in the 56th minute
